metadata.title: CVE-2021-25957 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In “Dolibarr” application, v2.8.1 to v13.0.2 are vulnerable to accounttakeover via password reset functionality. A low privileged attacker canreset the password of any user in the application using the password resetlink the user received through email when requested for a forgottenpassword.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
